explains: v. 使习惯于，使适应于

sentences.en: She tried to accustom herself to the tight bandages.
sentences.cn: 她尝试着使自己习惯那些紧绷的绷带。

sentences.en: It took him a while to accustom himself to the idea.
sentences.cn: 他过了一段时间才习惯这个想法。

sentences.en: When one has been in a family circle one cannot accustom oneself to this life!
sentences.cn: 当一个人已经在家庭圈子里，他无法习惯于这种生活！
